title: Clarkesworld Magazine - Science Fiction & Fantasy
author: Julie Dillon
raw_text: Skip to content Issue 110 – November 2015 Cover Art Gate World Julie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award. ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.

Issue 110 – November 2015
Cover Art
Gate World
Julie Dillon is a science fiction and fantasy illustrator creating art for books and magazines, as well as for her own projects and publications. She has won multiple Chesley awards, two Hugo Awards, and has been nominated for the World Fantasy Award.
ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
